widget.name: Spot The Alien Fish
widget.description:
Spot the Alien Fish is an informative app on alien fish species that can be found mainly around the Maltese waters and the Mediterranean.
Features on app Spot the Alien Fish app include: Getting information on each alien fish species. Sending a report if a fish was sighted or captured. Sending an image with the report of the captured or sighted fish. Ordering a poster on the different alien fish species.
widget.author: Yannick Farrugia and Darren Camilleri (MCAST ICA)
